channel.title: Pages on Petteri Nakamura
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Petteri Nakamura

item.title: Whoami
item.description: I currently work as a Cyber Security Manager, where I dedicate myself to enhancing our cyber security measures. I have a robust technical background, enriched by a Master of Engineering in Cyber Security and a Bachelor of Engineering in Network Technologies. Despite this strong technical foundation, I consider myself first and foremost a people person. My passion lies not just in understanding technology, but also in shaping it to serve people safely and securely.

item.title: CV
item.description: Work Experience Deltamarin Ltd. (2017 - Present) Cyber Security Manager (2022 - Present) Service Manager (2020 - 2022) System Administrator (2017 - 2020) doop dmp Oy (2012 - 2017) System Administrator / Testing Engineer ATR Soft Oy (2011 - 2012) Software Engineer Education Higher Education Master’s Degree in Information Technology, Cyber Security, Jyväskylä University of Applied Sciences (2017 - 2020) Bachelor of Engineering, Information Technology, Häme University of Applied Sciences (2005 - 2009) Other Education Specialist Vocational Qualification in Leadership and Business Management, Business College Helsinki (2020 - 2022) Performing as a Leader Managing Personnel and Skills Managing Customer Relationships
